summary: Container class that encapsulates all outputs of the OWL‑ViT object detection model, including optional training losses, classification logits, normalized bounding‑box predictions, and multimodal embeddings for both text and image patches, together with the raw outputs of the underlying text and vision encoders.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end training and inference of a vision‑language object detector by providing a single, structured payload that supplies loss information for optimization, raw predictions for post‑processing, and rich embeddings for downstream multimodal applications.
